name: Tiered Pricing Table for WooCommerce
author: u2Code

sections.description:
All-in-one and most complete dynamic pricing plugin for WooCommerce.

Tiered Pricing Table for WooCommerce allows you to easily set up flexible pricing rules based on product quantity. Rules can be set for specific products, product categories, or a customized selection of products.

Whether you’re a retailer, wholesaler, or service provider, this tool enables you to fine-tune your pricing structure to better meet the needs of your diverse customer base.

💡 Key features:

✅ Quantity-based pricing (Volume pricing)
Set different prices for different quantities of products.

✅ Role-based pricing
Set different prices for user roles or specific customers including quantity-based prices.

✅ Minimum\Maximum\Group of order quantity
Control the minimum, maximum and group of product quantity to purchase per product.

✅ Different templates to display pricing on the product page
You can show the tiered prices via:
➖ Table
➖ Blocks
➖ Options
➖ Dropdown
➖ Horizontal Table
➖ Plain text
➖ Tooltip

See screenshots

✅ Import\Export (WP All Import supported)
Import tiered prices in bulk including role-based and minimum order quantity rules.

✅ Format your prices on the product catalog with discounts in mind
Show the lowest price possible or pricing range from the lowest to the highest price.

Clean interface and powerful functionality allow you to make any custom pricing without a headache.

All features:

  • Show pricing in different places on the product page
  • Show saving amount to users (difference between original and discounted price)
  • Various customization (titles, colors, positions, and many others)
  • Built-in cache to provide the best performance
  • REST API
  • Debug mode
  • Many other little useful features

Premium features:

  • Percentage discounts for quantity-based rules
  • Role-based pricing rules
  • Custom columns for pricing table
  • Min\max order quantity control per product or category
  • Cart upsells (motivates users to purchase more to get a discount)
  • Totals on the product page
  • Clickable tiered pricing options
  • Lowest price or range of prices for the product catalog based on tiered pricing
  • Show the tiered price in the cart as a discount
  • Show the total price on the product page instead of the regular price

🔌 Integration with 3rd-party plugins:

✔️ WP All Import
✔️ Elementor
✔️ WPML
✔️ WPML Multicurrency
✔️ Product Bundles for WooCommerce
✔️ WooCommerce Product Add-ons
✔️ Aelia Multicurrency
✔️ Yith Request a Quote
✔️ WOOCS (WooCommerce Currency Switcher by FOX)
✔️ WCCS (WooCommerce Currency Switcher by WP Experts)
✔️ WCPA (WooCommerce Custom Product Addons)
✔️ Product Fields (Product Addons by StudioWombat)
✔️ WooCommerce Deposits
✔️ Mix&Match for WooCommerce

Check out our site to get more information about the Tiered Pricing Table for WooCommerce

Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

Set up a Demo to see how it works.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/tier-price-table directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the WooCommerce->Settings Name screen to configure the plugin

After installing the plugin set up your own settings
sections.faq:
How the import format looks like?

“quantity:price,quantity:price”

For example:
“10:20,20:18” – in this case 20$ at 10 pieces, $18 at 20 pieces or more.
The same format is for the percentage-based rules:
“quantity:discount,quantity:discount”

Please note that you have to use a dot as a decimal separator because a comma is used to separate the pricing rules.

You can change the rules separator (in case you use a comma as a decimal separator) using the “tiered_pricing_table/rules_separator” hook.

Can I show the pricing table/pricing blocks/pricing options using a shortcode

Yes, you can. There is the [tiered-pricing-table] available with a bunch of settings.

Can I show the pricing table/pricing blocks/pricing options via Elementor?

Yes, you can. Look for the “Tiered Pricing Table” widget.

Can I show the pricing table/pricing blocks/pricing options via Gutenberg block?

Yes, you can. Look for the “Tiered Pricing” block.

Can I apply tiered pricing for manual (admin-made) orders?

Yes, you can. There is the “recalculate with tiered pricing” button on each order that will recalculate order cost depending on tiered pricing rules.

sections.reviews:
5* Support

By nthanwrexhamtech on April 10, 2024

5* support. Mykola was not only quick to respond, but very helpful. Highly recommend this plugin.

Nice plugin, with some misses

By leiferikg on February 27, 2024

Overall a nice plugin that does what it says. However, the upsell function doesn't support WooCommerce Blocks. Considering this is the new standard, that seems like a pretty big issue. Plugin author indicates it might be fixed though.

Great solution with quick support

By separatereality on January 25, 2024

We use the pro version and are very happy with it.

The tiered pricing on single products is easy to configure and works great. Same with role-based global pricing rules, the upsale motivation hint in the cart and many other things.

Another easy improvement would be to add "Apply for brands" to the global pricing rules.
User groups are often entitled to a discount for certain brands.

Great work!

WCFM Error After 3.6.2 [2023-09-08] version

By akashansari001 on January 2, 2024

Hi admin your plugin is awesome but after 3.6.2 [2023-09-08] version its not compatible with WCFM when i try to add new product from wcfm admin its show error and destroy full wcfm admin panel plz fix this ASAP just waiting from your side.

Fastest support

By abooth69 on November 28, 2023

Contacted support a couple of times. Each time, got a response in seconds (maybe lucky with time zone); but always quick and technically of a very high standard. These guys know their stuff and the plugin works extremely well. They even logged onto my site and fiddled with the code to accommodate our unique requirements and said they would keep it in subsequent updates.

Worst plugin ever, I am losing money bc of it!!!

By mattmai on November 24, 2023

This is the worst plugin ever! It gets updated in main season 2 times and has huge bugs in it! Now during Black Week updated automated and on Black Friday it causing me huge losses because of a bug! I can highly recommend not to use it!
On variable products it uses the tier prices of the smaller variant on the bigger ones causing me a tremendous chaos!!

I would give it -100 stars, never had a price plugin that handled pricing that bad!

Good support!

By RashaMatt on November 16, 2023

I had an issue where an update of this plugin caused a problem, and the dev was very good about communicating and fixing it 👍

I have the free version of the plugin.

Tiered Pricing Table AMAZING!

By kloader04 on October 30, 2023

I love this product. It works exactly the way it should. No slow down on my site with 46 needed plugins (I checked it with GTMetrix).

Thank you!!!!!

Kevin

Performance issues

By Web Systems (websystems2006) on September 21, 2023

This plugin slows down webshop A LOT. I suggest you do your own performance tests (query monitor / GTMetrix, Google PSI...) before and after you start using it.
Other than that (quite crucial IMHO) it works fine.

Best Support and Plugin

By happyshrimp on August 19, 2023

The plugin works exactly as it should. But the support is much better than the plugin. I was helped directly, even though English is not my mother language, we were able to communicate well.
I am very confident and satisfied.

Thanks a lot Mykola

short_description: Allows you to set a specific price for a certain quantity of product. Shows quantity pricing table/blocks/options/dropdown/tooltip.
description:
